arn.description: The ARN that identifies the provisioning template.

defaultVersionId.description: The default version of the fleet provisioning template.

description.description: The description of the fleet provisioning template.

enabled.description: True to enable the fleet provisioning template, otherwise false.

name.description: The name of the fleet provisioning template.

preProvisioningHook.description: Creates a pre-provisioning hook template. Details below.

provisioningRoleArn.description: The role ARN for the role associated with the fleet provisioning template. This IoT role grants permission to provision a device.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

templateBody.description: The JSON formatted contents of the fleet provisioning template.

type.description: The type you define in a provisioning template.

provisioningRoleArn.description: The role ARN for the role associated with the fleet provisioning template. This IoT role grants permission to provision a device.
